Title: toFixedString
Description:
Converts a String type argument to a FixedString(N) type (a string of fixed length N).
If the string has fewer bytes than N, it is padded with null bytes to the right. If the string has more bytes than N, an exception is thrown.
s — A String to convert to a fixed string. String.N — Length N. UInt8
An N length fixed string of s. FixedString.
